name: sphinx
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Custom Sphinx recipe with libstemmer support

= REQUIREMENTS:

Debian or Ubuntu preferred. Needs build-essentials package since we are compiling it.

= ATTRIBUTES: 

The file attributes/default.rb contains the following attribute types: 

* sphinx version to install
* sphinx source path
* sphinx configure options

= USAGE:

Include sphinx recipe to install a compiled version of sphinx with libstemmer support
